price: Saa nkorͻfoͻ no na ԑnam wᴐn abotrԑ nti, yεde adan akԑseԑ bɛtua wᴐn ka. Yεde nkyea ne asomdwoeε na εbehyia wͻn wͻ (Aheman no) mu.
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ يُجۡزَوۡنَ ٱلۡغُرۡفَةَ بِمَا صَبَرُواْ وَيُلَقَّوۡنَ فِيهَا تَحِيَّةٗ وَسَلَٰمًا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: ulāika yuj'zawna al-ghur'fata bimā ṣabarū wayulaqqawna fīhā taḥiyyatan wasalāman
